snippet.title: THE DARK SIDE OF CECLON - Trailer - NEW Release date: January 20, 2025
snippet.description:
THE DARK SIDE OF CECLON is coming to Steam and Epic Games on January 20, 2025! (NEW Release date)!

THE DARK SIDE OF CECLON is a TPS open world with a unique blend of action/adventure gameplay with survival/RPG mechanics in a science-fiction universe. Jensen, the sole survivor of the Nexentia shuttle crash, finds himself alone on the planet CECLON, in an arid, hostile desert! You'll have to survive and face the terrible Nocturnes, primitive creatures, in order to bring Veka energy back to Earth, humanity's only hope.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1467090/THEDARKSIDEOFCECLON/
Epic Games: https://store.epicgames.com/fr/p/the-dark-side-of-ceclon-a226c2

Follow THE DARK SIDE OF CECLON on:
- Discord: https://discord.gg/Kqa47ppNqh
- Website: https://solidsstudiosolo.wixsite.com/thedarksideofceclon

Follow SOLIDS Studio on: 
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SOLIDSStudio/
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/solidsstudio_game/?hl=fr
- Twitter (X): https://twitter.com/SolidsStudio
- Linkedin: https://fr.linkedin.com/company/solidsstudio-solo

Copyright SOLIDS Studio 2024

#THEDARKSIDEOFCECLON #TDSOC #trailer #indiegame #indiegames #videogames #gamer #games #gaming #tps #action #adventure #survival #rpg #explore #scifi #space #openworld #CECLON #steam #pc #developer #youtubegaming 

-------

Song: Aliaksei Yukhnevich - Battle for the Universe (No Copyright Music)
Music provided by Tunetank.
Free Download:  https://bit.ly/3aoBIb1
Video Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ydGyaWXI6Zc&ab_channel=RoyaltyFreeMusic%7CCopyrightFree%7CTunetank
